Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This exceptional item boasts a range of features that make it stand out in its category. Considering its quality and functionality, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $80. However, to make this opportunity even more appealing, I am offering it to you for an exclusive price of $95. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our top-tier product. Let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to secure this deal. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
